021package org.biojava.nbio.aaproperties.profeat.convertor;
022
023public class Convert2Polarity extends Convertor{
024        /**
025         * Class for the conversion of protein sequence into polarity
026         */
027
028        @Override
029        public char convert(char c){
030                switch(c){
031                case 'L':case 'I':case 'F':case 'W':case 'C':case 'M':case 'V':case 'Y':
032                        return group1;//Polarity value 4.9-6.2
033                case 'P':case 'A':case 'T':case 'G':case 'S':
034                        return group2;//Polarity value 8.0-9.2
035                case 'H':case 'Q':case 'R':case 'K':case 'N':case 'E':case 'D':
036                        return group3;//Polarity value 10.4-13.0
037                default:
038                        return unknownGroup;//Non-standard AA
039                }
040        }
041        private static String[] subCategory = {"Value_4.9-6.2", "Value_8.0-9.2", "Value_10.4-13.0"};
042        @Override
043        public String[] getGrouping(){return subCategory;}
044        @Override
045        public String getAttribute(){return "Polarity";}
046}
